level.heading: Injunction.
level.text: Notwithstanding any other provision of this subchapter, WASA may seek appropriate civil action to secure a temporary restraining order, a preliminary or permanent injunction, or declaratory or other appropriate relief to restrain, minimize, halt, or eliminate the violation of, or attempted violation of, any provision of this subchapter or its implementing rules.

level.heading: Effect of Amendments
level.text: D.C. Law 18-256 substituted "WASA may seek" for "the Mayor may authorize".

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 6-76
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 6-76, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 8-105.01.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 6-95
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 6-95, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 8-105.01.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 18-256
level.text: For history of Law 18-256, see notes under § 8-105.02.
